overview: Jae-won, a competent husband at a stable workplace is enjoying his honeymoon with his wife. One day, he found a strange video through a USB. It contains his wife’s sex video, not with a man but with another woman. After seeing this, Jae-won suspects Ji-soo’s past life and invites Joo-hee, the other woman in the video to come over the weekend and find out the truth.
title: Wife's Woman
